Enzyme_protein_interactions.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element
Enzyme_protein_interactions.sparql.query:
PREFIX keywords:<http://purl.uniprot.org/keywords/> PREFIX uniprotkb:<http://purl.uniprot.org/uniprot/> PREFIX taxon:<http://purl.uniprot.org/taxonomy/> PREFIX ec:<http://purl.uniprot.org/enzyme/> PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX skos:<http://www.w3.org/2004/02/skos/core#> PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> PREFIX bibo:<http://purl.org/ontology/bibo/> PREFIX dc:<http://purl.org/dc/terms/> PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> PREFIX faldo:<http://biohackathon.org/resource/faldo#> PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> SELECT DISTINCT ?protein ?label WHERE { VALUES ?enzyme {ec:+inputID+} ?protein up:enzyme ?enzyme . ?protein rdfs:label ?label . ?protein up:organism taxon:+taxon+
}

Protein_enzyme_interactions.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

Protein_protein_interactions.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element
Protein_protein_interactions.sparql.query: PREFIX taxon:<http://purl.uniprot.org/taxonomy/> PREFIX uniprotkb:<http://purl.uniprot.org/uniprot/> PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> SELECT DISTINCT ?targetprotein ?label WHERE { VALUES ?sourceprotein {uniprotkb:+inputID+} ?sourceprotein up:interaction ?source . ?targetprotein up:interaction ?target . ?targetprotein rdfs:label ?label . ?source up:participant ?t . ?target up:participant ?t . ?targetprotein ?p ?a. FILTER (?sourceprotein != ?targetprotein) }

get_all_known_interactions.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

inhibited_by.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways element that are inhibited by a given source. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

inhibits.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways element that are inhibited by a given source. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

is_targeted_by.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways element that are inhibited by a given source. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

stimulates.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways element that are inhibited by a given source. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

targets.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways element that are inhibited by a given source. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

transcribes_translates.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways element that are inhibited by a given source. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element

Disease_association.sparql.DESCRIPTION: This query extracts from Wikipathways all simple interactions. These are relationships between one input and one output pathway element
Disease_association.sparql.MENU_LABEL: Get genes with the same Disease association
Disease_association.sparql.query: PREFIX up:<http://purl.uniprot.org/core/> SELECT DISTINCT ?targetprotein WHERE { VALUES ?sourceprotein {<http://purl.uniprot.org/uniprot/P05023>} ?sourceprotein <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/interaction> ?source . ?targetprotein <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/interaction> ?target . ?source <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/participant> ?t . ?target <http://purl.uniprot.org/core/participant> ?t . FILTER (?sourceprotein != ?targetprotein) }
